SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.platformer.escape_beyond.model.game

Class EntitySelector

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.model.game.EntitySelector
public class EntitySelector extends Object
A utility class for selecting and inserting entities into the game based on the current map level. Implements the Strategy Pattern to handle different entity insertion rules for each level.

This class dynamically loads and positions game elements such as platforms, obstacles, supplies, enemies, and destinations according to the game map's layout and level rules.

  • Method Details

    • InsertEntity

      public static void InsertEntity(char c, int j, int i)
      Inserts entities into the game based on the character symbol ('c'), column index ('j'), and row index ('i'), following the rules for the current map level.
      Parameters:
      c - The character symbol representing the type of entity to be inserted.
      j - The column index in the game map matrix.
      i - The row index in the game map matrix.

    • InsertEntityRuleLevel1

      public static void InsertEntityRuleLevel1(char c, int j, int i)
      Inserts entities according to the rules for Level 1.
      Parameters:
      c - The character symbol representing the type of entity.
      j - The column index in the game map matrix.
      i - The row index in the game map matrix.

    • getImageView

      public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImageView(Entity entity)
      Generates an ImageView for a given Entity.

      Configures the position, size, and image of the ImageView based on the entity's properties.

      Parameters:
      entity - The entity for which the ImageView is generated.
      Returns:
      The configured ImageView.
